titles.title: To require that any city that is completely surrounded by any other city must be assigned its own ZIP codes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 8/6/1998--Introduced. Prohibits a ZIP code that is assigned to a city or portion of a city that is completely surrounded by any other city from also being assigned to any area outside of the city so surrounded.
